text: Bajaj Finserv Limited, a part of Bajaj Holdings & Investments Limited, is an Indian financial services company"Bajaj Finserv Ltd" Bloomberg. Retrieved 2014-11-03."Bajaj Finserv Ltd" India Infoline. Retrieved 2014-11-03. focused on lending, asset management, wealth management and insurance."Bajaj Finserv Ltd." The Economic Times. Retrieved 2014-11-03."Bajaj Finserv to float a housing finance company" Times of India. Retrieved 2014-11-03."Bajaj Finserv reports 15% rise in Q1 consolidated net profit" Finalaya. Retrieved 2014-11-03. The company employs over 20154 employees at 1409 locations, and is engaged in consumer finance businesses, life insurance, and general insurance."Bajaj Finserv's Q1 consolidated net profit rises 14%" Business Standard. Retrieved 2014-11-03. Apart from financial services, Bajaj Finserv is also active in wind–energy generation with an installed capacity of 65.2 MW."Bajaj Finserv Ltd windfarm (India)" The WindPower. Retrieved 2014-11-03. Bajaj Finserv was ranked among The Economic Times 500 as #119 in 2014."Bajaj Finserv Ltd." The Economic Times. Retrieved 2014-11-03. Bajaj Finance Limited (BFL), participates in the financial business and is a company listed on The Stock Exchange, Mumbai (BSE) and the National Stock Exchange (NSE) ==Background== The financial services and wind energy businesses were transferred to Bajaj Finserv Limited (BFS) as part of the recently concluded demerger from Bajaj Auto Limited, approved by the High Court of Judicature at Bombay by its order dated 18 December 2007. The demerger was effective on 31 March 2007."Bajaj Auto demerger approved" The Economic Times. Retrieved 2014-11-03. Bajaj Holdings has been registered as a Non–Banking Financial Company (NBFC) under the Registration No. N–13.01952 dated 29 October 2009 with Reserve Bank of India (RBI). The company is classified as a Systemically Important Non–deposit-taking NBFC as per RBI Regulations. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Bajaj Auto Category:Bajaj Group Category:Companies listed on the Bombay Stock Exchange Category:Companies based in Maharashtra Category:Companies based in Pune Category:Financial services companies established in 2007 Category:NIFTY 50 Category:Indian companies established in 2007 Category:BSE SENSEX
title: Bajaj Finserv
